page.title: 20Games played in School.
page.content: {Popular Playground Games: Football}is played with a leather ball with{ 11 people on each team aiming to kick the ball into the opponent's goal.{Bulldog is a game for girls and boys. The one who is up calls out a name, he then tries to get to the other base to shout BULLDOG . The other people run & the person who is up tries to catch them. If the chosen person doesn't get across, the others run and he has to catch them too. Other games include {skipping,}using rope or elastic;{ Hop- {scotch }marked on the playground with 10 numbers;{"It"}is when you tag some- one & they are{it; }different types of {handstands;}&{leap-frog. }In Games and P.E. lessons we play {netball, basket- {ball, hockey, shinty & tennis. }We use the field for{football, rugby, cricket {rounders, athletics & cross-country.
